sourcesContent: import { Box } from '@mui/material' import Rating from '../rating' import WishlistBookCard from '../wishlistBookCard' function FooterBookCard(props) { return ( <> {props.authors.length > 0 ? <> {props.authors.map((name, i) => {(i ? ', ' : '') + name} )} : } {props.title} ) } export default FooterBookCard
